thread.title: The Dominican Republic celebrated the hell out of beating Team USA at the World Baseball Classic
thread.title_full: The Dominican Republic celebrated the hell out of beating Team USA at the World Baseball Classic

author: nick pants
title: The Dominican Republic celebrated the hell out of beating Team USA at the World Baseball Classic
text:
What a fun team!
The game between the Dominican Republic and the United States was fun as hell. Both teams are full of all-stars, and on Saturday night, the Dominican Republic came out on top in dramatic fashion .
. @ncboomstick23 put a team on his back and a country on its feet. #WBC2017 pic.twitter.com/c2tB3D0LOk 
— WBC Baseball (@WBCBaseball) March 12, 2017 Everyone was full of celebration! The fans. The players. Ooooh the players.
#TeamDominican Jajajajaja #WBC2017 #WORLDLATINSTAR.com by @bonchevip1 
A post shared by World Latin Star (@worldlatinstar) on Mar 11, 2017 at 7:30pm PST 
Even retired players and those not participating in the World Baseball Classic were hyped!
Here’s Johnny Cueto.
pic.twitter.com/zIlNJ3QaJU 
— Johnny Cueto (@JohnnyCueto) March 12, 2017 David Ortiz took a break from his bowling party to join in on the celebration.
S ye pic.twitter.com/f6TW9TX5EY 
— David Ortiz (@davidortiz) March 12, 2017 Go nuts, Dominican Republic fans! You deserve it!
Plantain Power!
